name: Leaps of Faith (FastToad)
description:
In this game every jump drains your health.  Use fish to heal and checkpoints  to spawn at if you run out of health. 

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys / DPad: Move

Space / Enter / Dualshock X /  Xbox A / Nintendo B: Jump

CREDITS:

Programming / Design: Fast Toad

Art / Design Assistance: Mudd
